description: Finally after much fumbling around with setting up Q# environment and thinking too hard about simple problems only to realize that I was, infact, thinking much too hard, I've completed the Codeforces Q# Warm-up round.
This draft paper of TLS1.3 w/ hybrid quantum keys by *Douglas Steblia* of U of Waterloo seems interesting.
I've been learning Q# from Quantum Katas.
